verses.text: \w On|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* first \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Israelites \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*:

“\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w census|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, listing \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w* \w by|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* divisions—\w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w can|strong="H1121"\w* serve \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w army|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w man|strong="H7218"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* each \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w*, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* each \w family|strong="H1004"\w*, must \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H1004"\w*. The Leaders of the Tribes

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* assist you: From the tribe of Reuben, Elizur son of Shedeur;
from Simeon, Shelumiel son of Zurishaddai;
from Judah, Nahshon son of Amminadab;
from Issachar, Nethanel son of Zuar;
from Zebulun, Eliab son of Helon;
from the sons of Joseph: from Ephraim, Elishama son of Ammihud, and from Manasseh, Gamaliel son of Pedahzur;
from Benjamin, Abidan son of Gideoni;
from Dan, Ahiezer son of Ammishaddai;
from Asher, Pagiel son of Ocran;
from Gad, Eliasaph son of Deuel;
and from Naphtali, Ahira son of Enan.”

\w These|strong="H1992"\w* \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* appointed \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* fathers, \w the|strong="H3478"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H3478"\w* clans \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. The Number of Every Tribe

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w these|strong="H3947"\w* \w men|strong="H8034"\w* who \w had|strong="H4872"\w* been \w designated|strong="H5344"\w* \w by|strong="H5344"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* recorded \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w ancestry|strong="H3205"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, \w counting|strong="H4557"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w*,

just \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*. \w So|strong="H6485"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*:

From the sons of Reuben, the firstborn of Israel, according to the records of their clans and families, counting one by one the names of every male twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Reuben numbered 46,500.
From the sons of Simeon, according to the records of their clans and families, counting one by one the names of every male twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Simeon numbered 59,300.
From the sons of Gad, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Gad numbered 45,650.
From the sons of Judah, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Judah numbered 74,600.
From the sons of Issachar, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Issachar numbered 54,400.
From the sons of Zebulun, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Zebulun numbered 57,400.
From the sons of Joseph: From the sons of Ephraim, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Ephraim numbered 40,500.
And from the sons of Manasseh, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Manasseh numbered 32,200.
From the sons of Benjamin, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Benjamin numbered 35,400.
From the sons of Dan, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Dan numbered 62,700.
From the sons of Asher, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Asher numbered 41,500.
From the sons of Naphtali, according to the records of their clans and families, counting the names of all those twenty years of age or older who could serve in the army,
those registered to the tribe of Naphtali numbered 53,400.

\w These|strong="H8147"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w men|strong="H6485"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron, \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* assistance \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w each|strong="H8147"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* representing \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w age|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w older|strong="H4605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* could \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*’s \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w counted|strong="H6485"\w* according \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w counted|strong="H6485"\w* totaled 603,550. The Exemption of the Levites

\w The|strong="H8432"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, however, \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w along|strong="H8432"\w* \w with|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H8432"\w* \w by|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w their|strong="H8432"\w* fathers.
\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*:

“Do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w number|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3881"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w census|strong="H7218"\w* \w with|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* other \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Instead|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w furnishings|strong="H3627"\w*, \w and|strong="H3881"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3881"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w and|strong="H3881"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w articles|strong="H3627"\w*, \w care|strong="H6485"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3881"\w* \w camp|strong="H2583"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

Whenever \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w is|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w move|strong="H5265"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H2114"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w take|strong="H3381"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* whenever \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w is|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w*, \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H2114"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*. \w Any|strong="H4191"\w* \w outsider|strong="H2114"\w* \w who|strong="H3881"\w* \w goes|strong="H3381"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w must|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* divisions, each \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* own \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* own \w standard|strong="H1714"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w camp|strong="H2583"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w watch|strong="H8104"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* responsible \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*.”

\w Thus|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
